resources.string: This app was created with the intention to do a brief apresentation about myself
To continue, Shake the phone… or click in the button below.
Rua Central de Vilar, n 371, Paredes (Porto)
Android Developer (Java) - Technical Course since March,2019 to March,2020
Started in March 2019 and concluded in March 2020

In this course I´ve learned how to become an Android Developer Jr, creating the necessary base to give the first steps on this path.The language that I am using to recreate all apps and learn the Android creation concept is Java with the IDE Android Studio. I know it´s far away of really being an Android Developer, but it really openned my mind, taught me a lot of concepts of Android and the most important, I really enjoy doing all the activity and I had a great support team that were always giving me the energy and teaching me as much as possible.
Started in February 2015 and concluded in February 2016

Web Developer - Technical Course Cotuca - Escola Técnica Unicamp In this course I´ve learned the main principles how developing a web page, passing through the tecnologies listed below:HTML5 , CSS and JavaScript.
Started in February 2008 and concluded in February 2012

Gratuated in Finance and Administration Industries. University of Anhanguera Educacional Unity 3, Campinas (Brasil) During 4 years I´ve studied about the biggest administrators in the world, as Henry Ford, Maslow and a lot more, and their tecniques to reach better results in the organization. Fincance situations that a company can have, contability and strategies that can improve the companie´s results.

1 - My entire experience as a worker is with Logistic, Administration and Export and Import Process, but after some years on this path, I discovered a passion of programming and since this day I started looking for things that I could learn regarding technology

2 - I´ve started doing a course of Algotithm and JavaScript with (HTML and CSS), at Cotuca Brazil in 2015 until 2016, during this course I could absorve some concepts regarding webDevelopment, it helped me a lot, it made the things easier, I can say it because I already knew the basic concepts as variables and your kinds, the loops cicles etc, then it made the path a bit shorter when I began the Android Development Course at MasterD Portugal in 2019.

3 - I had no idea how was possbile to program for Android, but as soon I began the course, I really loved, I know that I am far away of becoming a good Android Developer, but I´ve no doubt I´ll reach it, an example is comparing myself 1 year ago and now, so I learned that I don´t have to compare with experts, what I need is learn with them and then compare my evolution, with the guidance that MasterD gave me and the curiousity I have, I believe I can go beyond giving one step each day.
I consider myself an easy person to comunicate and I am always looking for learning new things always searching for my development and colaboration.

I am far away of being an expert, but I can say that between these 3 languages I am really interested to learn, currently ( JAVA ) is the one I fell more comfortable as I´ve used this language during this last year in my course at MasterD
I know that to become a good Android Developer I need to learn Kotlin, at this momment I am really new with this language and just giving the first steps.

I´ve recenblty tried some tutorials regarding this language to see how it works and it is really interesting, until now I´ve only created one simple App that I´ve posted on my gitHub and seems to be really promising.
"Press the button below to generate 1 of the 7 possible phrases. "
The Square below will show the app choice.
